text:
Hi all, have deployed sample chain code02 and able to interact with it from CLI but would like to interact with chaincode through rest API using post ( invoke ) and get ( query ) methods, so how can i expose it can you share any references, am planning to expose services using node JS
am referring <https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/blob/v0.6/examples/sdk/node/app.js>  but this js doesn't have any services exposed from it
We're going to use production mode on v0.6, is there any standard hardware requirement or guideline to help estimate the performance? Thank you in advance for any answers.
